Goal Representation:
behavior clean_sink(sink:item, cleaning_solution:item):
    body:
        achieve_once inhand(cleaning_solution)
        scrub(sink)
        achieve clean(sink)

behavior __goal__():
    body:
        bind sink: item where:
            is_sink(sink) and id[sink]==42
        # Select the sink with ID 42, which needs cleaning

        bind cleaning_solution: item where:
            is_cleaning_solution(cleaning_solution) and on(cleaning_solution, sink)
        # Select the cleaning solution located on the sink

        clean_sink(sink, cleaning_solution)
        # Invoke the behavior to clean the sink using the cleaning solution
